description: Enoki lives in the Kanto region near Mt. Moon. He knew Professor Cerise as a young boy. Chloe was introduced to him and he realized how fast time had gone by as he recalled her father was amazed with all the plants, trees and Pok√©mon just like she was. Enoki remembered the time when they nursed an injured Clefairy back to health as it had hurt its leg after being chased by a Beedrill.
name: Enoki
